job description:
Job Description
SAAS Company Based in Dublin, California is looking for an entry level Data Analyst to run excel reports and sorting/querying them to look for trends and inconsistencies in inventory tracking and logistics planning.

Job description:
  • 0-2 years of experience required in developing using SAS/SQL.
  • |1-2 experience working as a data analyst.
  • MS-Excel and working with excel functions
  • o Strong collaboration skill and communication skill
  • o Some experience in supporting Data teams preferred
  • o Detail oriented and able to identify process improvements.
  • o Strong organizational, analytical and critical thinking skills with the ability to manage and prioritize multiple responsibilities and deadlines.
